did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: John Condry papers, 1967-1993.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes publications and papers written by Condry concerning his research on the psychology of television and its impact on children.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor in the Dept. of Human Development (1966-1993) and Director of the Center for Research on the Effects of Television.

Condry graduated from West Virigina University with an A.B. degree in 1961 and an M.A. in 1962. He received his PhD in social psychology in 1966 from the University of California at Los Angeles. His entire teaching career was spent at Cornell with sabbaticals at the University of Kansas and at Stanford University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes publications and papers written by Condry concerning his research on the psychology of television and its impact on children.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University Center for Research on the Effects of Television.

prefercite.p: John Condry papers, #23-13-3741. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
